title: Uchuu no Kishi Tekkaman Blade OVA: Twin Blood

synonyms: Uchuu no Kishi Tekkaman Blade - S1 Twin Blood
alternative_titles.ja: 宇宙の騎士テッカマンブレード

synopsis: Twin Blood is an alternate version of Blade and Evil's first battle, with drastically different character and mecha designs from the rest of the series. Blade/D-Boy does not need Pegas to transform and the armor more closely resembles the Radam humanoids from Tekkaman Blade II.
